title: God is Love
description:
Readings from:

Exodus 34:5-7

Psalm 33:5

John 3:16

Romans 5:8; 8:38-39

1 John 4:16b

Today's passages were read by Kevin Kamm, a campus minister at Illinois State and Western Illinois University.
One Minute With the Bible is brought to you by the Christian Standard Bible. New episodes published every weekday.
